Class tripleplay.ui.Root

Added Constructors
Root(Layout, Stylesheet) Creates a new root with the provided layout and stylesheet.
 

Added Methods
Root pack(float, float) Sizes this element to its preferred size, computed using the supplied hints.
IDimension preferredSize(float, float) Computes the preferred size of this root.
Root setAbsorbsClicks(boolean) By default, all clicks that fall within a root's bounds are dispatched to the root's layer if they do not land on an interactive child element.
void validate() Applies the root size to all descendants.
